name: Tiny Tidy Town
description:
Description

Tiny tidy town is a little casual game where you build a small town, tile by tile. 

Each roll of the dice gives a new tile to create. Match adjacents tiles for a better score.

Unlock new tiles and change your odds with your custom dice.

Controls

Left mouse click : Build - Select

WASD : Camera Movement

Q/E : Camera Rotation

Mouse Wheel : Camera Zoom

Tab : Open Menu

R : Rotate Tile (does not affect score)
